flowRoot.flowPara: Libvisual instantly transforms your favourite music into psychedelic art. It works by running audio from your microphones and speakers through an impressive array of effects that crunches the waveform into pixels. With the right drivers, you can display visuals on just about anything.

We need all the help we can get to bring Libvisual to the next level. Areas that need always work are coding, documentation, translations, and testing. Send us an email at our mailing list, or drop by our IRC channel on FreeNode #libvisual.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam nec lectus metus, non varius mi. Etiam vitae consequat felis. Nunc ullamcorper mattis ornare. Sed tincidunt augue arcu. Phasellus pulvinar metus vel neque pretium accumsan.

After a 5-year hiatus, we are back! Progress is moving swiftly on the next stable release 0.5.0. Among the changes already made are, a new CMake build system, Android support, and a new tool for testing and benchmarking.

text.tspan: Libvisual is Free, Open Source Software.

flowRoot.flowPara: We are now on GitHub and use Git for versioning.
